VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Sharpshooting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in accuracy when firing both high-tech and low-tech ranged weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Aiming
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in aiming when firing both high-tech and low-tech ranged weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Reloading
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in reloading both high-tech and low-tech ranged weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Piercing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in armor piercing when using sharp melee weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Dueling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in the fast-paced armed melee combat.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Flooring
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in constructing floors.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Repairing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in repairing broken down and damaged structures.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Architecture
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating complex and beautiful buildings.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Building
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in constructing massive amounts of buildings quickly and efficiently.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Tunnelling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in rapidly digging massive tunnels and caverns.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Drilling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in the efficient use of a deep drill to mine resources.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Prospecting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in maximizing the ore yield from each vein mined.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Geology
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in obtaining more stone chunks when mining.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Culinary
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in extremely safe and efficient cooking.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Brewing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in preparing simple drug and alcohol products.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Butchering
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in the efficient butchering of animals.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Foraging
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in living off the land and foraging the fruits of the forest.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Sowing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in quickly sowing and harvesting large amounts of plants.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Harvesting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in ensuring no parts of the plant are wasted on harvesting.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Pruning
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in communicating psychically and pruning the Gauranlen trees.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Taming
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in taming wild animals without provoking them.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Training
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in training colony animals effectively.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Ranching
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in ranching and animal produce gathering.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Hunting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in the art of stealthy hunting.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Mech Mastery
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in all matters related to mechanoids.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Manufacturing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in crafting items at remarkable speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Craftsmanship
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in crafting items of superior quality.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Exquisite Artistry
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in creating works of art of impeccable quality.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Prolific Artistry
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in creating works of art quickly and efficiently.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Surgery
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in rapidly performing safe and effective surgeries.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Treatment
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in rapid and effective treatment of wounds or illnesses.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Influence
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in influencing the opinions and ideological beliefs of others.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Negotiation
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in handling negotiation and recruitment.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Suppression
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in apprehending others and suppressing their will to escape.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Researching
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in performing research and operating scanning equipment.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Drug synthesis
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in synthesizing complex chemical drugs.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Speed-reading
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in rapidly consuming written material.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Hacking
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Expertise in hacking computer terminals.
